definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It is discussed the occurrence and harmfulness of valsa sordida of poplar in 4 aspects.
sentences.chinese: 从4个方面论述了杨树烂皮病的发生规律及危害性。

sentences.english: Cassava brown streak disease is a more destructive form of cassava mosaic.
sentences.chinese: 木薯褐条病是木薯花叶病中危害性较大的一种病。

sentences.english: The biological invasion has got great attention from all over the world because of its huge harm.
sentences.chinese: 生物入侵因其巨大的危害性成为全球关注的热点问题。

sentences.english: The perniciousness of act brought out the theory of illegal composition.
sentences.chinese: 行为的危害性确立了违法构成理论的产生。

sentences.english: It is significant to objectively judge the actions' social harmfulness.
sentences.chinese: 坚持行为杜会危害性判断的客观性，意义重大。

sentences.english: The harmfulness of educational corruption has historical corrosion, towards which we can not re-main indifferent.
sentences.chinese: 教育腐败的危害性具有历史腐蚀性，决不可漠然处之。

sentences.english: Athetis lepigone is a new insect pest in seedling stage of summer corn in China, and causes serious damage.
sentences.chinese: 二点委夜蛾是我国夏玉米苗期的新害虫，危害性极强。

sentences.english: Money Laundering is a complex high-intelligent crime, which is of severe danger to society.
sentences.chinese: 洗钱是一种具有严重社会危害性的复杂的高智商犯罪。

sentences.english: He admonished me of the danger of smoking.
sentences.chinese: 他警告我，抽烟危害性大。

sentences.english: In this case, we are concerned with the danger of a rogue application.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况中，我们关心的是恶意应用程序的危害性。

sentences.english: Numerous counterexamples show the perils of solitary innovation.
sentences.chinese: 有很多例子表明单打独斗的创新的危害性。

sentences.english: This paper describes the toxicity and harm of hydrogen arsenide.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章介绍了砷化氢的毒性及危害性。

sentences.english: Does brothers mouth endanger a gender illy ?
Consequently, it speeds up the transformation of ethanol to ascetic acid in your blood.
sentences.chinese: 有些宝物酒嗜好者因此忽视酒精的危害性而过量饮用。

sentences.english: Once the sludge dries, the lead may be even more dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 而且一旦这些淤泥干燥后，铅的危害性将会更大。

sentences.english: Byck described the hazards of a key part of the process.
sentences.chinese: 白克形容加工过程中一个重要部件的危害性。

definition: to jeopardize/to harm/to endanger/harmful effect/damage/CL:個|个[ge4]
a danger concealed within sth/hidden damage/misfortune not visible from the surface
